website_summaries.verdict: This upscale-looking Oxford cloth garbage bag is great for professionals who drive between appointments and have the receipts and coffee cups to prove it.
pros: 1.85-gallon capacity, leak proof trash bag made of oxford cloth
Adjustable straps lengthen to 23 cm maximum – long enough to fit around headrests and consoles
Can line it with garbage bag
Designed to stay shut so trash stays out of sight
Leans nicely against passenger side of console
cons: Though the bottom is stabilized with plastic, the bag is made of cloth, so it's not fully waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Actually holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually pretty impressed with this trash can. It looks really small but it can actually hold a lot. I wanted to test it’s limits and found that it can hold unlimited amounts of straw wrappers and receipts along with 2 grande cups from Starbucks, 1 large McDonald’s cup, 1 10oz juice bottle, and a Wendy’s bag with empty cartons inside. I put an empty plastic shopping bag in it as a trash bag and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement!
customer_reviews.text: This didn't come with bags and it clearly states on the video and pics that it comes with 30 BAGS. It's pointless without the bags. I'm mad. I'm returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for trash in your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash bag!! It sits nicely behind your center console and looks clean and tidy. The material is well made and the additional trash bags you buy fit perfectly in the bottom. This trash bag is small so don't expect to fit a bunch of garbage (like multiple drink bottles, etc.) I purchased it for small everyday items, like wrappers, tissues, etc. It does the job nicely! Still fits a starbucks cup or two!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband would get annoyed because my old trash can would fall over every ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband would get annoyed because my old trash can would fall over every time I turned a corner. And he refused to use it. Now my trashcan stays in place and he can't complain. It's small, easy to use and lightweight. It's easy to install too so if you have someone in your middle seat in the back you can simply move it out of the way for them. I love the convenience of putting a grocery bag in it and have it stay put. Its great for the occasional coffee spill from the remnants in a cup and it's easy to just throw the whole bag away. It's a great little trashcan for your car!
customer_reviews.author: Mandaline5

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small
customer_reviews.text: The pics are bit deceiving. Bag is good quality but not that big. One venti Starbucks cup will take 70% of the space. So if u are looking for something bigger this not for you. I am going to try this for few day. Hopefully space won't bother me
customer_reviews.author: Pandit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my backseat needs!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the backseat - I used the strap (length adjusts) around the front seat armrest to keep it in place on our 2016 VW Golf. Snap tabs on side keep bag in place. Folds flat for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Wogglecious

customer_reviews.title: very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: very happy with my purchase! i used to use a shopping bag where I took the passenger headrest off and secured around the metal things. But I got awesome seat covers so that was no longer an option. This is way more classy and adult, and I specifically bought it because you can secure it to the center console. The adjustable strap is extremely useful. I wouldn't hate if it were a little taller, however it's still a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Love this little trash can in my Highlander!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great little trash can! I love the strap that hooks my center console of my Highlander. I included a picture to show the cup holder clearance if needed to open it. This is a fabulous investment to treat yourself with. My kids now throw their trash away with ease and my car stays soooo clean! I ended up buying the trash bag insert they sell simply for the convenience factor. I'll keep buying the bags again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This is small. I ended up returning. my car doesn't have a spot for it to hold on to. it was too small anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Specialk2plus1

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The video shows a box of black garbage bags and the description said 30 bags came with the garbage can. I got nothing like that just a folded bag. In the video it looked like this ingenious box of bags that fit at the bottom of the garbage bags disappointed to say the least they didn't come with my product. Beware buyers
customer_reviews.author: Tine l

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use, it ripped. No worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Aya Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car...not to small, not too big....just right.
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice bag. Perfectly sized, Has a hard base insert and lining is perfect. This is the second one I bought and simple love it. I did buy a third one from another manufacturer...didn't like it. Too large, no base insert....so it "collapses"when free standing. Get this from KMMotors...you will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: MikeA

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: The bags dont really fit, they are just sitting in my glove compartment collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: ImAlwaysApril

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT work in my 2018 Expedition and there were no removable trash bags!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough, damaged easily.
customer_reviews.text: This ripped apart within the first 24 hours I had it in my car. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but can b improved
customer_reviews.text: It works the only thing is the bottom of the container needs like a flat hard base at floor to keep it open. Most will use a standard plastic bag which works but also is pain because it collapses on itself so the hard base on bottom be like cardboard or something will help to keep open. Plus the strap is to high on top not allowing the bag to fold down. I rather use a bag inside than to throw in bottles or food and create a mess inside. It does the job with some tweaking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what others are complaining about. This waste container is the perfect size for a vehicle, is sturdy enough for everyday use, clearly states the product does NOT come with bags, and is very reasonably priced. My only recommendation is to avoid the high priced Jopps Plastic Bags ($7.99 for 30) and instead by generic black plastic bags to fit a 1.2-1.5 gallon container. Amazon carries the perfect bag, 120 for $9.99, here's a link:
customer_reviews.author: G Olds

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until I ran out of bags....
customer_reviews.text: I loved this trash can and raved about it to my friends and now it is flimsy and worthless without the refill box. Where can i get the refill bags? I bought it with the understanding that you can buy refill bags and now I can't find them.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Works like I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy enough for the purpose I purchased it for. I don't use it as a trash container in the front so I have no idea how easy it is to clean. I use it strapped around the console and twisted to the back seat to hold my dogs things; it works great for this. The straw basket that I had before fell apart and was always in the way of your feet. This is much better. I do intend to get another one in the future for the front. I hope this helps with your question.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Key

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It would be the perfect size if it would just stay in the square form. It folds closed and then makes it very hard to put garbage in. I’m tired of struggling with it, but missed the window for a return.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Decent trash can for car but not for Hyundai Velosters
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent trash can. Easy to keep in the car and easy to clean. However, this is touted a good trash can for cars with the center arm rest. I have a 2016 Hyundai Veloster and this fits extremely tightly and awkwardly around my center arm rest. It's okay but I just can't open the center console with the trash can around it. However, I decided to keep and use this because it is convenient. But I am looking to buy another garbage can for my car because as convenient as it is, the fact that it keeps rolling around my car is not fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Game changer in keeping my car clean
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for keeping my front seat floor space clean (which usually turns into a giant pile of "I'll just throw that out when I get home," which never happens... You can fit a LOT of garbage in here, which was pleasantly surprising. It doesn't pull too much on the shifter, either. I do wish that it stayed open a little better when it's nearly empty, but what can you do. It also would be nice if there was a small hook or something on the sides so that if you have a plastic bag lining the inside, it keeps it down, but hey, first world problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K

customer_reviews.title: Only one flaw...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this trash bin for the car. I liked the size and the materials used to manufacture it. The only problem I have found is the location of the strap which secures the unit to your shifter (or whatever) causes the liner to ride up. It would have been better to secure the strap I some other fashion or configuration. Also, the bin came with NO trash liners. These are sold separately. Finally I have a way to help keep my car clean.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and tore up after a week in my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: nancy baccam

customer_reviews.title: No bags; No fun.
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I don't like the most with this item is it didn't come with any bags or any information on how to buy the bags that fit this little car can. I bought this for my office area to start with, to use in a small spot and thought it looked like a good value and I could also use in the car. I now don't use it because there are no bags. I haven't had the time or desire to go through the hassle. I also wish the straps were longer. For the company - include bags - include details what kind and where to buy bags and I would be much happier.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has the clips on the side to hold bags. I used store bags that have the handles and it's great to keep it in place. I didn't like the strap going over the gear shift so I opened the center console and put it in there so it hangs behind it in the backseat. The center console closes just fine with it there. I'm really glad to have something for the trash in my car. With 3 kids it can get messy pretty fast. It's big enough for a good bit of trash but small enough that it's not in the way in my small Mazda6.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: ... seat area as my gearshift is not in a good place to hold this
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the back seat area as my gearshift is not in a good place to hold this. I wrapped the strap around the console, adjusted and perfect! It is exactly the size shown in the pictures. As a matter of fact, the very detailed pics of this is precisely why I purchased this. I am not sure how some people felt deceived about the size—looks the same in my car. I'd love to find some black grocery bags, but you can see by my pic that the bag fits and secures nicely. The bottle shown is a 32 oz bottle. Not exactly small. I find it well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: kris brinker

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to, a little small though
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be but that’s probably my own fault for not reading the dimensions better. It probably would only fit a few of my Dunkin’ Donuts cups but at least they will be kept in one spot. Fits nicely behind my center consul in the back without taking up any foot space. Seems to be pretty sturdy and made of decent material. Wish it was a little bit bigger though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Thing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing! My car used to be a mess all the time, and now I can keep it clean with this wastebasket that doesn't get in the way, yet hold all of the trash. 😍
customer_reviews.author: mattphat23

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It keeps the floor, cup holders, and everything in between free from garbage that my passengers like to stick into them. Now they can be normal human beings and throw their garbage away properly. It doesn't leave that much leg room ( I have a smaller car) But it works ! It's sturdy, can hold it own weight and can hold quite a bit of garbage but depending on what you put in there you should probably have bag/ liners in there (Doesn't come with the order) or dump it out everyday.
customer_reviews.author: TSK

customer_reviews.title: Small but useful
customer_reviews.text: I like that this stays below the air vent when you place it over the console into the back seat. It Keeps shape at the bottom because of the cardboard that is on the bottom but the sides try to close. I’m sure over time that that won’t be a big concern. The snaps on the side help to keep a bag in the container. I wish there was some sort of lid to made it a little sleeker but it’s not a huge deal. It’s nice that the main strap administered so that you can place it in different places.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who loves a trash basket? This guy!
customer_reviews.text: How can you love a trash basket? I must be crazy, but I do. It attaches out of the way. I have it secured in the back by running the strap around my center console and it doesn't budge. Perfect size to not be in the way. And, so easy to change out the bags. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: You probably want this.
customer_reviews.text: Firs great behind console on CRV. Everyone can reach it. Just a well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: PAPA

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving four stars because I feel like it's false advertisement to show those bags because it makes you think it comes with it because it doesn't state that it doesn't. Other than that I really love it but I have my own little glade bags and I put one in it and it works just fine. The buttons on the sides still snap on to the bag so that way it can keep the bag more in place. So I'm happy with it, I've always wanted a little bag like this for trash because I usually just stick trash in the door of my car.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON & CHELSEA VO

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: This bin has a video connected to it that VERY CLEARLY shows a flat fit-to-size thin container that holds trash bags. It’s placed in the bottom and you pull one up, snap in place, and when full, while you pull the bag up, it pulls the replacement bag up. It clearly implies the bags are available, either comes with some bags or you can order them. In the question section, it was asked about the bags, response; no bags either come with or are available to purchase. You’re to use plastic bags from stores. Dishonest.. I’m getting totally away from foreign supplies, I’ve had way too many problems. The unit itself seems to be fine. Thus the high rating.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Trash bin
customer_reviews.text: This trash bin has really come in handy in my car. I used to put the trash behind my seat and almost every time I'd forget about it and someone would need to get in the back and there my trash would be. How embarrassing! I don't have to worry about that anymore. And it holds quite a bit of trash. I put bin in the back between the two seats and it fits very nicely. My Mother-in-law liked it so much she had me order one for her. It's nice to always have a trash bag at your fingertips as well since they fit down in the bottom of the bin and pop up like tissues. Very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Bags may come with it...or not
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two at different times, both advertised with bags. One came with bags, one did not. Bags are a tight fit and are held down by two snaps on front and back sides, but because of straps originating from high on the sides, the bags keep being pushed up and off the sides. Well made and roomy enough for my purposes, but a real pain in the butt keeping the bags open in the container. Needs four snaps, one on each side, not just two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the front passenger well with the strap on my shifter. It's small so stays out of the way of the passenger. I use plastic grocery bags and the snaps on either side of the opening hold it in place. Finally glad to have a trash receptacle in the car!
customer_reviews.author: Alita Hawksworth

customer_reviews.title: Tiny. Came with no bags.
customer_reviews.text: The standard trash can is not the one pictured. The $20 larger one is the one in all the pictures. The standard trash can holds 2 large fast food cups or six standard soda cans sideways. That's all. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Okay product. I’m glad I have it but I’m sure there area better products out there.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bags that go with this product and unfortunately, they do not fold over the product so there’s always space between the bag and the sides. I hate that. It works to hold trash but with the bag not staying in place, it doesn’t look neat or tidy.
customer_reviews.author: TLALONDE16

customer_reviews.title: Fit as promised. Perfect for the CRV.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to use plastic grocery bags. Love the snaps for holding handles of bag in place so the bag doesn't get pushed down. Another great feature is the strap that holds it in place. If you choose small waste basket bags without handles it works with them as well. The snaps will compress the bag to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: jwood1964

customer_reviews.title: Liked the idea but doesn't meet the expectation.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this in my car for a few months. It just doesn't stay "open" no matter where I put it. When I leave it behind the console, it's just hard to reach from either the driver side or passenger side. When I have it next to the console by the passenger seat, it takes some leg room of the passenger.
customer_reviews.author: ema

customer_reviews.title: Not super helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new little car. I had the strap around my stick shift which was long enough to have it in the foot well of the passenger side, but the strap tore away from the bag pretty quickly. Also, the sides are not stiff enough to stand apart, so it collapses in on itself. Not really handy when you are driving and trying to throw something away. I will keep looking for a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: ZanyMomofFour

customer_reviews.title: Beats using Walmart bags
customer_reviews.text: I put this around the headrest on my folding middle seat in my work truck 2018 Ford F250. It seems sturdy and should hold up well. I dont use a bag. Just out the trash directly into the trash can and then dump it when I go to the gas station every morning. It holds quite a bit of stuff. Doesnt take up a lot of room. Only suggestion I'd make is to put a clip on the strap to make it easier to get it in and out. Other than that, I like it
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Nice little trash can..
customer_reviews.text: I love this little trash can. It fits nicely in my 2010 Acura MDX. I have the strap around my gear shifter and the bag on the passenger side and there's still plenty of leg room. The trash can holds a good amount of trash too. I was using an empty plastic shopping bag for trash but due to the location of my gear shifter the bag wouldn't reach the passenger side, so I had to find another alternative, which I'm glad I purchased this trash can. It definitely serves its purpose and at a good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Huckel

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a garbage can for my new to me vehicle and this caught my eye. There was a picture with multiple drink cups. This really does fit a lot of garbage. I love that it has the strap to secure it so that it doesn't slip and slide. I actually attached my in the back behind the center consul. I rarely have five people in my vehicle so this was perfect. The snaps to secure small garbage bags are handy too. Really like this item.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. WernerTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is the perfect size and the strap is adjustable. It is the right amount of sturdiness so I don't have to worry about it collapsing and things spilling or it being uncomfortable if someone is sitting in the passenger seat. I love the way the bags snap in so that you don't have to mess with it when you are driving.
customer_reviews.author: Mindi Estrella

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect in the trash can it's made for
customer_reviews.text: I know, I know, I could just use a grocery store bag (they are too big) or a vegetable bag (kind of flimsy) to line my trash can in my car. But I like this for its ease, keeps the little trash can open and, like those vegetable bags, when you take the old one out, a new one pulls up ready to be used. Takes a little adjustment to make the trash can work better, will write my review on that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie H

customer_reviews.title: Very accessible to me while driving. Very accessible to me while driving
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all. Actually, I used to put trash bags from grocery stores after my shopping. Now, I don't have to do that anymore. It's comfortable, it keeps my car clean. Very accessible to me while driving. Now, there comes a problem a little bit difficult to solve, the trash bags for this specific item isn't cheap. If you don't manage it, you'll probably end up throwing it away. Overall, great thing for your car.
customer_reviews.author: Bwessnher

customer_reviews.title: but this one holds position and is easy to set up and put where you want it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. I have had other in car trash bins, but this one holds position and is easy to set up and put where you want it without it collapsing. Exactly as stated. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Garbage can like it, liners create a problem
customer_reviews.text: I do like the garbage container, but there is a design flaw with the liners. The garbage bags fit perfectly over the bag, but when one pulls up the strap the liner comes off over the corner edges. The snaps should be attached to hold the handles. Once the liners fit perfectly over the bag, one would attach the handles with the snap and everything would stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: APkobl

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a good solution but it’s just ok. I’m fine with the fact that it doesn’t come with bags. I bought some biodegradable bags to use. But the straps are attached so high to the back that you can’t fold the bag top over the side. So the bag won’t stay open and constantly falls inside the bin. Secondly, the strap broke after just a couple months of use. So, I’ll be looking for a different kind...
customer_reviews.author: Heather Davis

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: In the picture, it shows putting the garbage around the gear shifter and around the center counsel. However, if u put it around the gear it does move when you switch gears. I tried to put it around the center counsel but the strap wasn't long enough. Eventually, I found a place to put it and I do like it. It's convenient to put all of my straw wrappers and receipts in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: This is needed in every car.
customer_reviews.text: Does your husband keep his car filthy? Do you have OCD? Than this is the thing for you! Will he actually throw his trash in the car trashcan? Probably not. But will it help your ocd to know that you gave him all the tools necessary to keep a clean car? Yes. And on the off chance that trash makes it in this, you will see him in a whole new light. Fabio who?!
customer_reviews.author: Adalina

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact
customer_reviews.text: It has a flat that folds down to hold it open. I just used grocery bags as my bags and it works fine. I have a 2017 Ford escape and I have it positioned behind my consel between the seats. It is the same height as my cigarette light but my son has no issues charging his tablet on the go. It is small but holds at least 3 soda bottles standing up with paperish products around it..
customer_reviews.author: Nahoo

customer_reviews.title: Bags Not Uncluded, So Not Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I read through the details, and never saw the part that says that the vinyl box of plastic bags didn't come with it. The small hidden backup liners they showed in the listing was one of the main selling points. I dont think I would have purchased this one had I realized they would have to be purchased separately and for almost the same price as the can for only 30 liners!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: A great way to get rid of trash in your car
customer_reviews.text: It is not not expensive or fancy and does not interfere with front seat passenger's footroom. It is plain, light weight and easy to install by simply looping the strap over the console's gear shift. It does the trick of keeping the car clean and trash free and best of all provides a useful way of getting rid of all those pesky leftover plastic grocery bags!
customer_reviews.author: Bargainhunter

customer_reviews.title: Nice garbage for the car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this garbage for my car because bags always seem to fall off the hook and get lost. I like that it has snaps to secure the bag inside the garbage. I also like that it stays hooked. I like that it is black and that it is easy to clean. The only think I don't like is that the top seems to collapse some of the time which can make it hard to throw things away from the driver's seat. I think I am going to find a dowel to put along the top to keep it open better.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Loesch

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that works in my GS350
customer_reviews.text: This is the only trash bin that I have found that will work in my Lexus GS350. The strap is long enough to hang from the gear-shift and not interfere with the mouse paddle. My only small complaint is that I had presumed that it came with the little baggies, that lock on the sides. However, without a baggie and against my black interior it's barely visible, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: TMooreKajiwara

customer_reviews.title: im so happy i bought this
customer_reviews.text: got this for my new car and i never have trash lying around my car. i attached it to hang off the back of my center console, so its not in the way but i can easily put stuff in it even while driving. i've had my car for about a month now and its almost as clean as when i got it. so much easier to just take the bag out and throw away than grabbing a grocery bag and hunting your car for every piece of trash lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like it. But not easy for me to relocate it for the characteristics of my car
customer_reviews.text: Working good so far. I decided to put in the second row of seats to have more space and has worked fine. It is good size but I have found a little tricky to adapt the cord and keep it steady. Probably is for the confirmation of my car because the Gear stIck is next to the steering wheel so I don't have nothing to hang it. Good for next people.buying to consider that.
customer_reviews.author: Alejo g.

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty (as in lots of stuff fits)
customer_reviews.text: While this is smaller than I had imagined, it works beautifully! Its size actually becomes an advantage because (at least in my SUV), that means there are several places it will work. I did not purchase the liner bags that are sold separate - I just line w/ plastic shopping bags I already have from wherever and use this products straps/snaps to hold in place by putting around the plastic bag handles. Very happy w/ this!
customer_reviews.author: H. Krech

customer_reviews.title: Get  a refuge container for the whip !
customer_reviews.text: If you have a child that is smart yet disorganized or maybe your kid is just a slob, heck maybe you are a slob, I don’t know your deal, this is something you need to get. Now it doesn’t dump itself so there is that too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Jessica Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: It’s a car trash can.
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a car trash can. I accidentally ordered two. I have the extra to my sister. She likes hers. Mine is in the front seat with the strap around the gear shift and Hera is hanging from the back of the front seat. They work well in both places. I was disappointed that it didn’t come with bags. The description suggested it would.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Placement is everything, and dont dirty the bag.
customer_reviews.text: Its nice, but doesn't come with bags, yes I know the picture and video makes it seems like they have bags. I put a grocery bag but I dont have too many at times so I try and keep the one clean. Also i had to put the bin in the back seat because it's just not the most comfortable thing to have it hanging from my gear shifter. Also, it's not that big, two, Togo cups and some receipts and boom refill. But realistically I like having all the trash in one spot, isnt that the point! Would I buy this again honestly, probably, probably not... it's a trash can for your car, dont over think it
customer_reviews.author: Monica Rojas

customer_reviews.title: I like the design and the idea behind it
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the idea behind it. However, if you have a larger car, (I have a 2015 Tahoe) the straps do not fit around the middle console to put it in the back seat like I was hoping. My gear shift is on the wheel so that doesn't work either. I actually took the straps off another trash can I had and safety pinned them to this one to make this work, sort of.
customer_reviews.author: Tobye David

customer_reviews.title: Car Trash?
customer_reviews.text: With two kids I wanted my car to "try" to stay clean. This little addition actually worked! It fits perfectly off of my center console and fits in-between on the floor of the back seat. Both kids through their trash in the bin and then I remove it. Id like to say in my case, for my purpose, this worked wonderfully. The product itself will 100% work for you! If you are purchasing this for your kids to use, you have a 50/50 chance! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Beware: the video is misleading.  The plastic bags are not included.
customer_reviews.text: The video on the Amazon website shows a box of plastic bags the fits at the bottoms of the bin where you can just pull up a bag as needed. I ordered two of these and was disappointed that when they arrived, there are no bags included. That was one of the main reasons I ordered these so it would be easy to empty and keep the bin clean.
customer_reviews.author: Roger B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I used to just keep a grocery bag in my car for trash, and I bought this for better organization and presentation, but its really not much better. It doesn't stay snugly in place for long, and the bags dont fit inside cleanly with ease. Serves its purpose and might work better in certain models of cars. I dont hate it, but I wouldn't highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and can hold a lot
customer_reviews.text: A little big for the front of the car even though I do like the size. I hung over the passenger head rest so it faces the back seat and is perfect for what I need since I am using extra paper towels and gloves with the pandemic. Was disappointed it did not come with at least one bag as shown in the picture and I had to order the bags separately.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: works great - exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Given the pandemic, I use this bag to hold lysol wipes, paper towels, and hand sanitizer. It keeps my supplies from rolling around on the floor. The strap keeps the bag anchored to the side of the console so it doesn't crowd the passenger's leg. I was afraid the strap might interfere with the shifter. It doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Kind of small
customer_reviews.text: I'm not saying that this bin doesn't meet the dimensions, but beware that it is a very small bag. I bought it for my stepdad for Christmas because he works out of his car a lot and eats a lot of fast food. He'd be better off keeping a grocery bag on his gear shift for all the room that his box provides. I wouldn't use it as a garbage bin, but if you need to store small kids road trip games, maybe it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: ShMeDa

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within 5 minutes! Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product! I just got a new car, and am trying to prepare to have my whole family in the car in a few days while on vacation. This product had decent reviews, so decided to give it a chance. I received the garbage can today, and immediately went to install it in my car. As I was unhooking it to attach, the strap just ripped right off. There was no force on my part, and I realized it is just cheaply made garbage. Now I will need to find time to go return before we leave for vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for vehicles
customer_reviews.text: Pretty handy trash can for a vehicle. I really like the snaps that hold the trash bag in place. This is alot more convenient than just have a bag hanging from the glove box. Haha. Pretty durable for what it is. **This does NOT come with bags** I reccomend this product if you want a handy trash can for your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Mom630310

customer_reviews.title: Need to have options for mounting.
customer_reviews.text: Handy way to keep car trash organized and out of the way. It did not come with bags, but that is not a problem. You can find all sorts of bags that will work. I do not recommend mounting it over the gear shift as shown in the picture on the web, as this could be a hazard. I inserted an iPhone cable and gear cup into the cup holder and secured it to that. It should probably come shipped with a hook and loop mounting option.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I really like the the bags can be snapped into place so they don't move. Versatile to put in several places. Don't bother buying the special bags. Just use grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Merkel

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about as long as a grocery run
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I had this for less than a week. It hung over the passenger area (which no one sat in) and upon moving it to empty the bag the strap snapped off. LITERAL waste of money and poor quality. I am all for frugality but you have an opportunity to choose a bag that will last more than a week by not choosing this and gambling on a different cost effective brand.
customer_reviews.author: KeeksTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but collapses
customer_reviews.text: It keeps collapsing on the top. There were no plastic bags inside the garbage. Size is great. Not too big not too small. I have 2 small kids who eat snacks and the empty bags and candy wrappers used to be on the car floor. Now they put it in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful purchase. I have been wanting a trashcan in my car for some time now. I constantly have junk all over - especially with two young children. Now it all gets contained. Very easy to set up. You can use any bag from the grocery store. The clips hold the bag down great and the clasp secures the trashcan in place wonderfully without getting loose. I truly don't know what people can complain about with this item. And for ten bucks? Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BlissfullyySweetTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING ... DOESN’T INCLUDE BAGS
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed with this product. The video in the description clearly states that it includes 30 garbage bags and yet they are NOT included. It’s very misleading bc even the directions listed below the product describe how to put in the little black bags. I purchased two of these and now have to go back and purchase garbage bags. ?? Highly disappointed bc the reason I chose it to begin with was the neat and tidy look of the little black bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but lid comes off easily
customer_reviews.text: This trashcan looks very nice. It's flat bottom and strap help hold it in place. But if anything touches it, the lid comes off real easily. However, the can would work fine without the lid too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T.

customer_reviews.title: works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I put this behind the console in my Camry. Just the right size. Not gargantuan, and not too small for me. I have small small plastic trash bags (the smallest I could find) and they work well with this item. There are snaps on the side of this 'wastebasket' that I just snap thru the plastic bag and the bag is secure. also, this seems really well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have with 2 adolescent boys with allergies. Totally thought this was going to be a flimsy item and I was totally wrong. It Is awesome! Thank you for giving me something that can stand up to my boys filth! Plenty of Room and can fit shopping bags if you don't want to get tiny trash bags. Living it so far.
customer_reviews.author: lacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I needed a little trash can/bag for my new car and this isn't exactly like the one I have in my other car but it works just as good! I put it around the center console in my SUV and I just reach behind my seat if I have anything to throw away and its nice and convenient! I just leave a plastic Walmart bag in it and remove it when its time to empty and it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this trash container.
customer_reviews.text: This trash gets in the way of the passengers legs. The worst part is the strap that you hang around the gear shift. It gets in the way of the cup holders & the plug ins for the phones. Not to mention it is really cheaply made. You can hang it from your center console & into the back seat however, my console (arm rest) won’t close with the strap in there.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri L.

customer_reviews.title: No more mess on the passenger's side floor!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife usually trow paper bills and water bottles on the floor and then at the end of the day pick all up to throw on the trash. Got this bin for our Toyota Corolla 2014 and set it behind the center console, in the middle of the back seat. Now the car is always clean with no small paper bills on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Rz

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good enough trash can. There is nothing extraordinary about it, but there is also nothing bad about it either. I constantly have bottles and wrappers in my car and was tired of trash on the floor. It holds a good amount of trash so I can't complain. I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Allen

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Nice replacement for the circular one I had. It kept getting in the way. This rectangular one is much better and longer, too. It has solved my problem. I would have given it five stars if the price were a little cheaper but I'm still glad I ordered it. The round one was a nuisance. This one expands as it's filled and is convenient AND not a nuisance to passengers. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MEC

customer_reviews.title: Very snall
customer_reviews.text: I should have realized how very small this is and that’s my own fault for not doing so. It might hold 2-3 soda bottles before being full. It seems to be made well though and very cute. It doesn’t fit very securely either but still does the job. I’m just not thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: jbeverage

customer_reviews.title: The bags dispenser recommended for this garbage, doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: I had to take the bags out of the cardboard box and just put them into the garbage frame. the garbage itself seems well made. The bags keep sliding into the garbage frame though, so that isn't so great. I wouldn't buy again for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not quite large enough to go around entire top of the trash bin when the bags are secured with the snaps and the bin is hanging up. When they run out I might try other options to see if they are a better fit and more cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kt J

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never use a shopping bag again!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always used to use a shopping bag for collecting garbage in my car ...it was very convenient but looked tacky.. I love this foldable car garbage can and garbage bags .. it looks small but there is plenty of room inside .. perfect size ... does not take a lot of room .. I love the snaps on the side to hold the bag in place ... I bought one for my husband as well
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Armanious

customer_reviews.title: Good car trash
customer_reviews.text: This is simple, with a decent capacity. I placed it on the floor behind the center console and secured it with the strap, which is easy to adjust. I like that it doesn’t take up much room, and the buttons are very convenient for securing a plastic bag so any liquid trash is contained.
customer_reviews.author: llshen

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. It seems smaller in the pictures than it really is. I have it hanging off the gear shift and over the passengers side. When my bf sits in the passenger seat his leg room is limited - he hates it. But for me, if I didn’t have anyone in passenger seat it would work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa C.

customer_reviews.title: My car is no longer a mess!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on the go so I tend to eat in my car a lot . This little garbage bin has saved me from accumulating clutter! I attached it to the center arm rest so it would be in the middle of the back seat floor, and its perfect. It doesn't get in the way of any leg room and it is adjustable in length so it should fit in multiple models. If you feel like you need to clean your car more often get this garbage bin to help. I also use grocery store plastic bags to fill it.
customer_reviews.author: Daria R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stable, unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Compact footprint, yet large enough for anyone's needs! Love the snap to secure the bag. I am super tidy & want the car clean...but... my little people are NOT! I have had all kinds 9f rubbish receptacles, & this is perfect. Does not obstruct the vent & charging port, or the armrest, or the floor. I have a Honda Pilot, but futs in the Accord just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Antisis

customer_reviews.title: I went prime happy
customer_reviews.text: Not very function. Too much ch $ for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: amycakes

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it!
customer_reviews.text: I can not tell you how many times I have needed a trash can while driving! This is perfect! You can clip it anywhere in your car and it looks great, especially if the inside of your car is black! Perfect if you have messy children as well! I have had it for a month and I can’t live without it!
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: They work, but won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I tried the bags because the advertised them with the garbage can. The trash bags work, but are very thin. I won't by again, I'll just use grocery bags. Not doing to pay money, for what I can get for free. BUT I LOVE the trash can itself & glad I bought that!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bixby

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, works well and serves the purpose. Just a bit to wide and could cause the passenger to have less leg room. I cold put it in the back seat but the kids would just complain about not having enough room.
customer_reviews.author: Rak

product_meta.title: KMMOTORS Jopps Foldable Car Garbage Can Patented Car Wastebasket Comfortable Multifuntional Artificial Leather and Oxford Clothes Car Organizer Enough Storage for Garbage
feature_bullets: ◆Make your car clean - KMMOTORS Jopps Car Garbage can has Big Capacity, trash bag can helps keep your car clean & tidy. The trash bag is handy and convenient way to stay organized while traveling or vacationing. Which can keep your car clean, organized and free of trash.
◆Adjustable straps - Maximum 24inches, which is long enough to fit around anything in my car like your headrest. With the adjustable strap and the snap, this car garbage can be the one your own.

◆Oxford cloth - Jopps is constructed with a high quality durable materials and leak-proof design.The leak proof garbage bag is constructed out of rugged pack cloth that it can provide maximum strength, durability,and longevity.

◆Multifunctional : This Car trash can is not only a trash can but can also be used as a storage bag for toys, drinks or important documents. Our travel trash can is that it also doubles as a travel cooler. The thermal insulated waterproof liner holds ice to keep drink and snacks cold for hours in the car or picnicking.
◆Cautions : The video is only for reference, there's no plastic bags when you buy the garbage can. If you want to use the customized plastic bags, you have to buy it separately.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,461 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
